title: Grand Theft Auto (GTA) Classics Collection
description:
Grand Theft Auto (GTA) is a computer and video game created by Scottish
company, DMA Design (now Rockstar North) and published by BMG Interactive
in October 1997. The game allows the player to take on the role of a criminal
who can roam freely around a big city. Various missions are set for
completion, such as bank robberies, assassinations, and other crimes.

GTA: London 1969 is a mission pack for Grand Theft Auto, released April 29,
1999 It takes place in London, in 1969, as the title implies. The player once
again enters the role of a criminal looking to work his way up the career
ladder of organized crime. The game uses the same game engine as Grand Theft
Auto, thus giving the game graphics reminiscent of the aforementioned game,
and the gameplay and game mechanics are also very much alike. Like Grand Theft
Auto the mission pack is divided into sub-sections with short cutscenes in
between.

GTA: London 1961 is a second mission pack for Grand Theft Auto, and it
requires both Grand Theft Auto and GTA: London 1969 to be installed. It was
released June 1, 1999. As the name implies, the game takes place in London in
the year 1961, eight years before the events that took place in GTA: London
1969. The expansion includes new missions, 22 new vehicles, a new cutscene,
and a new multiplayer deathmatch map based upon Manchester. The 1961 setting
makes this mission pack the earliest GTA game chronologically. GTA: London
1961 seems to be the least known chapter in the Grand Theft Auto series,
most likely due to its inconspicuous download location and dependence
on word of mouth.

Grand Theft Auto 2 was released on October 22, 1999. It is a sequel to the
original Grand Theft Auto. It expanded on the top-down, open-ended crime
world gameplay formula with a host of new features including the advent of
multiple rival gangs ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ seven, to be exact, including the Yakuza, Scientists,
Looneys, Rednecks, Zaibatsu, the Russian Mob and Hare Krishnas. Earn your
respect with each gang. Reap the benefits with all manner of shady
work-for-hire gigs contracted your way. And climb your way to the
top of the criminal pile.


This torrent contains Grand Theft Auto, its mission packs: London 1969
and London 1961, and Grand Theft Auto 2. Maps have been included for easier
navigation through the game. I also included Language Patch for GTA 2 which
will add Italian, German and French language support. The size of this torrent
is 699 MB and it fits perfectly on a single CD. Please refear to the included
ReadMe.txt files before the installation.


Download speed will be a bit slow until there are few seeders.
Be sure to seed after you have finished downloading, at least
until your ratio is 1.000, to keep this torrent alive.
